source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX("LastUpdateDate/Time") as NewWatermarkvalue from customers

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @OldWatermark AS DATETIME
SET @OldWatermark  = '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}'

DECLARE @NewWatermark AS DATETIME
SET @NewWatermark  = '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

DECLARE @OldWMDM AS INT
SET @OldWMDM = MONTH(@OldWatermark)*100 + DAY(@OldWatermark)

DECLARE @NewWMDM AS INT
SET @NewWMDM = MONTH(@NewWatermark)*100 + DAY(@NewWatermark)

select * from dbo.DimCustomers 
where MONTH([DateofBirth])*100 + DAY([DateofBirth]) > @OldWMDM 
and MONTH([DateofBirth])*100 + DAY([DateofBirth]) <= @NewWMDM 
and [CurrentRecordFlag]='Y'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX("LastUpdateDate/Time") as NewWatermarkvalue from customers

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @OldWatermark AS DATETIME
SET @OldWatermark  = '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}'

DECLARE @NewWatermark AS DATETIME
SET @NewWatermark  = '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

DECLARE @OldWMDM AS INT
SET @OldWMDM = MONTH(@OldWatermark)*100 + DAY(@OldWatermark)

DECLARE @NewWMDM AS INT
SET @NewWMDM = MONTH(@NewWatermark)*100 + DAY(@NewWatermark)

select * from dbo.DimCustomers 
where MONTH([DateofBirth])*100 + DAY([DateofBirth]) > @OldWMDM 
and MONTH([DateofBirth])*100 + DAY([DateofBirth]) <= @NewWMDM 
and [CurrentRecordFlag]='Y'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		{InsertDate/Time} as timestamp,
		{LastUpdateDate/Time} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerTbl
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistTbl
CustomerTbl derive(Age = iif(month(currentDate())*100+dayOfMonth(currentDate()) < month(DateOfBirth)*100+dayOfMonth(DateOfBirth),
year(currentDate()) - year(DateOfBirth) - 1, 
year(currentDate()) - year(DateOfBirth)),
		DimensionFromDate = currentDate(),
		DimensionThroughDate = toDate('2999-01-01'),
		CurrentRecordFlag = 'Y',
		ForwardStortationArea = substring(PostalCode, 1, 3)) ~> CalculateNewColumns
CalculateNewColumns derive(CurrentAgeGroup = concat(toString(floor(Age/10)), '0-', toString(floor(Age/10)), '9')) ~> CalculateAgeGroup
CalculateAgeGroup split({InsertDate/Time} == {LastUpdateDate/Time},
	disjoint: false) ~> IfNewCustomer@(IsNewCustomers, NotNewCustomers)
LookupExistTbl split((CurrentAgeGroup != ExistCurrentAgeGroup) || (ForwardStortationArea != ExistForwardStortationArea),
	disjoint: false) ~> TypeOfChange@(Type2Change, Type1Change)
IfNewCustomer@NotNewCustomers, RenamedExistTbl lookup(CustomerID == ExistCustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'last',
	asc(ExistCustomerKey, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupExistTbl
IfNewCustomer@IsNewCustomers, IfAlreadyUpdated@NotUpdated union(byName: true)~> UnionWithType2SCD
TypeOfChange@Type2Change split(DimensionFromDate == ExistDimensionFromDate,
	disjoint: false) ~> IfAlreadyUpdated@(AlreadyUpdated, NotUpdated)
ExistTbl select(mapColumn(
		ExistCustomerKey = CustomerKey,
		ExistCustomerID = CustomerID,
		ExistFirstName = FirstName,
		ExistLastName = LastName,
		ExistDateOfBirth = DateOfBirth,
		ExistCity = City,
		ExistProvince = Province,
		ExistPostalCode = PostalCode,
		ExistAge = Age,
		ExistCurrentAgeGroup = CurrentAgeGroup,
		ExistForwardStortationArea = ForwardStortationArea,
		ExistDimensionFromDate = DimensionFromDate,
		ExistDimensionThroughDate = DimensionThroughDate,
		ExistCurrentRecordFlag = CurrentRecordFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenamedExistTbl
IfAlreadyUpdated@NotUpdated derive(NewDimensionThroughDate = currentDate()-1,
		NewCurrentRecordFlag = 'N') ~> DerivedNewSCDColumns
DerivedNewSCDColumns alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> UpdateSCD
UnionWithAlreadyUpdated alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> UpdateInfoOnly
TypeOfChange@Type1Change, IfAlreadyUpdated@AlreadyUpdated union(byName: true)~> UnionWithAlreadyUpdated
UnionWithType2SCD sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		DateOfBirth,
		City,
		Province,
		PostalCode,
		Age,
		CurrentAgeGroup,
		ForwardStortationArea,
		DimensionFromDate,
		DimensionThroughDate,
		CurrentRecordFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> InsertNewRows
UpdateSCD sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CustomerKey'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DimensionThroughDate = NewDimensionThroughDate,
		CurrentRecordFlag = NewCurrentRecordFlag,
		CustomerKey = ExistCustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UpdateSCDRows
UpdateInfoOnly sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CustomerKey'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		DateOfBirth,
		City,
		Province,
		PostalCode,
		Age,
		CurrentAgeGroup,
		ForwardStortationArea,
		CustomerKey = ExistCustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UpdateInforRows

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		{InsertDate/Time} as timestamp,
		{LastUpdateDate/Time} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> IncCopyCustomerTbl
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> IncCopyTargetTbl
IncCopyCustomerTbl derive(ForwardStortationArea = substring(PostalCode, 1, 3),
		NewCustomerFlag = iif({InsertDate/Time}=={LastUpdateDate/Time}, 'Y', 'N'),
		Age = iif(month(currentDate())*100+dayOfMonth(currentDate()) < month(DateOfBirth)*100+dayOfMonth(DateOfBirth),
year(currentDate()) - year(DateOfBirth) - 1, 
year(currentDate()) - year(DateOfBirth))) ~> DerivedColumns
JoinWithTarget derive(CustomerID = iifNull(CustomerID, ExistCustomerID, CustomerID),
		FirstName = iifNull(FirstName, ExistFirstName, FirstName),
		LastName = iifNull(LastName, ExistLastName, LastName),
		DateOfBirth = iifNull(DateOfBirth, ExistDateOfBirth, DateOfBirth),
		City = iifNull(City, ExistCity, City),
		Province = iifNull(Province, ExistProvince, Province),
		PostalCode = iifNull(PostalCode, ExistPostalCode, PostalCode),
		Age = iifNull(Age, ExistAge, Age),
		ForwardSortationArea = iifNull(PostalCode, ExistForwardStortationArea, ForwardStortationArea),
		NewCustomerFlag = iifNull(ExistNewCustomerFlag, NewCustomerFlag, ExistNewCustomerFlag)) ~> UpdateAllColumns
IncCopyTargetTbl derive(NewCustomerFlag = 'N',
		ExistAge = iif(month(currentDate())*100+dayOfMonth(currentDate()) < month(DateOfBirth)*100+dayOfMonth(DateOfBirth),
year(currentDate()) - year(DateOfBirth) - 1, 
year(currentDate()) - year(DateOfBirth))) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		ExistCustomerKey = CustomerKey,
		ExistCustomerID = CustomerID,
		ExistFirstName = FirstName,
		ExistLastName = LastName,
		ExistDateOfBirth = DateOfBirth,
		ExistCity = City,
		ExistProvince = Province,
		ExistPostalCode = PostalCode,
		ExistAge,
		ExistCurrentAgeGroup = CurrentAgeGroup,
		ExistForwardStortationArea = ForwardStortationArea,
		ExistDimensionFromDate = DimensionFromDate,
		ExistDimensionThroughDate = DimensionThroughDate,
		ExistCurrentRecordFlag = CurrentRecordFlag,
		ExistNewCustomerFlag = NewCustomerFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumns
DerivedColumns, RenameColumns join(CustomerID == ExistCustomerID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithTarget
UpdateAllColumns derive(CurrentAgeGroup = concat(toString(floor(Age/10)), '0-', toString(floor(Age/10)), '9')) ~> CalculateAgeGroup
CalculateAgeGroup sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		NewCustomerFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		DateOfBirth,
		City,
		Province,
		PostalCode,
		Age,
		CurrentAgeGroup,
		ForwardStortationArea,
		NewCustomerFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> StageCustomerTbl

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		NewCustomerFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerTbl
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistTbl
CustomerTbl split(NewCustomerFlag == 'Y',
	disjoint: false) ~> IfNewCustomer@(IsNewCustomers, NotNewCustomers)
LookupExistTbl split((CurrentAgeGroup != ExistCurrentAgeGroup) || (ForwardStortationArea != ExistForwardStortationArea),
	disjoint: false) ~> TypeOfChange@(Type2Change, Type1Change)
IfNewCustomer@NotNewCustomers, RenamedExistTbl lookup(CustomerID == ExistCustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupExistTbl
SelectStageRows, IfNewCustomer@IsNewCustomers union(byName: true)~> UnionWithType2SCD
CurrentRecordOnly select(mapColumn(
		ExistCustomerKey = CustomerKey,
		ExistCustomerID = CustomerID,
		ExistFirstName = FirstName,
		ExistLastName = LastName,
		ExistDateOfBirth = DateOfBirth,
		ExistCity = City,
		ExistProvince = Province,
		ExistPostalCode = PostalCode,
		ExistAge = Age,
		ExistCurrentAgeGroup = CurrentAgeGroup,
		ExistForwardStortationArea = ForwardStortationArea,
		ExistDimensionFromDate = DimensionFromDate,
		ExistDimensionThroughDate = DimensionThroughDate,
		ExistCurrentRecordFlag = CurrentRecordFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenamedExistTbl
TypeOfChange@Type2Change derive(NewDimensionThroughDate = currentDate()-1,
		NewCurrentRecordFlag = 'N') ~> DerivedNewSCDColumns
DerivedNewSCDColumns alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> UpdateSCD
TypeOfChange@Type1Change alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> UpdateInfoOnly
ExistTbl filter(CurrentRecordFlag == 'Y') ~> CurrentRecordOnly
TypeOfChange@Type2Change select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		DateOfBirth,
		City,
		Province,
		PostalCode,
		Age,
		CurrentAgeGroup,
		ForwardStortationArea,
		NewCustomerFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStageRows
UnionWithType2SCD derive(DimensionFromDate = currentDate(),
		DimensionThroughDate = toDate('2999-01-01'),
		CurrentRecordFlag = 'Y') ~> AddSCDRows
AddSCDRows sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		DateOfBirth,
		City,
		Province,
		PostalCode,
		Age,
		CurrentAgeGroup,
		ForwardStortationArea,
		DimensionFromDate,
		DimensionThroughDate,
		CurrentRecordFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> InsertNewRows
UpdateSCD sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CustomerKey'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DimensionThroughDate = NewDimensionThroughDate,
		CurrentRecordFlag = NewCurrentRecordFlag,
		CustomerKey = ExistCustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UpdateSCDRows
UpdateInfoOnly sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CustomerKey'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		DateOfBirth,
		City,
		Province,
		PostalCode,
		Age,
		CurrentAgeGroup,
		ForwardStortationArea,
		CustomerKey = ExistCustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UpdateInforRows

source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomers
DimCustomers derive(UpdatedAge = iif(month(currentDate())*100+dayOfMonth(currentDate()) < month(DateOfBirth)*100+dayOfMonth(DateOfBirth),
year(currentDate()) - year(DateOfBirth) - 1, 
year(currentDate()) - year(DateOfBirth))) ~> RecalculateAge
RecalculateAge split(UpdatedAge%10 == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> AgeGroupChange@(AgeGroupChanged, AgeGroupNoChange)
AgeGroupChange@AgeGroupNoChange alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> UpdateAge
AgeGroupChange@AgeGroupChanged derive(UpdatedAgeGroup = concat(toString(floor(UpdatedAge/10)), '0-', toString(floor(UpdatedAge/10)), '9'),
		NewDimensionFromDate = currentDate(),
		NewDimensionThroughDate = currentDate()-1,
		NewCurrentRecordFlag = 'N') ~> UpdateType2SCDColumns
UpdateType2SCDColumns alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> UpdateOriginalRow
UpdateAge sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CustomerKey'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		Age = UpdatedAge
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UpdateAgeOnly
UpdateOriginalRow sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CustomerKey'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		DimensionThroughDate = NewDimensionThroughDate,
		CurrentRecordFlag = NewCurrentRecordFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UpdateSCDRows
UpdateType2SCDColumns sink(input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		DateOfBirth as date,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Age as integer,
		CurrentAgeGroup as string,
		ForwardStortationArea as string,
		DimensionFromDate as date,
		DimensionThroughDate as date,
		CurrentRecordFlag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		DateOfBirth,
		City,
		Province,
		PostalCode,
		Age = UpdatedAge,
		CurrentAgeGroup = UpdatedAgeGroup,
		ForwardStortationArea,
		DimensionFromDate = NewDimensionFromDate,
		DimensionThroughDate,
		CurrentRecordFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> InsertNewRows
